imdb.plot outline: Set in Moscow, Russia from 2007 to the Summer of 2010. This was a popular weekly political talk-show covering current events in Russian politics, economy and society. Two co-hosts: Maria Gaidar, the daughter of the former Prime Minister of Russia, and Oleg Kashin, a popular Russian journalist, do deliver their sharp and witty commentaries about current events in Russia.
imdb.title: Chyornoe i Beloe
plot: Political talk-show in Moscow, Russia.::Steve Shelokhonov

Set in Moscow, Russia from 2007 to the Summer of 2010. This was a popular weekly political talk-show covering current events in Russian politics, economy and society. Two co-hosts: Maria Gaidar, the daughter of the former Prime Minister of Russia, and Oleg Kashin, a popular Russian journalist, do deliver their sharp and witty commentaries about current events in Russia.::Steve Shelokhonov
